odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: The crack schooner Moonlight (4:18) -- Saint Martin Island (7:56) -- The wreck of the Erie Bell (3:37) -- Follow the drinkin' gourd (2:50) -- When the Willie went down (4:30) -- Perry's victory on Lake Erie (5:01) -- Shanty boy on the Big Eau Claire (4:37) -- Lament for the lost lake sailors (6:09) -- The Ward Line (4:43) -- The mermaid of Ontario (2:56) -- Charles Conrad on the S.S. Badger (5:14) -- Shallo Brown (2:05) -- The Scottish hero (3:51) -- The returning (3:32) -- Phantom ships that pass in the night (3:11)
